rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTF1010, BTP1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {BTF2223%, BTG2223, BTW2223}

description: This subject analyses and evaluates criminal conduct in the business world. It examines conduct within corporate entities which may lead to criminal (or other serious penalties) being imposed on corporations and/or individuals. Areas covered include industrial manslaughter, serious cartel conduct, liability for defective disclosure and insider trading. The subject considers the legal and practical difficulties which arise in detecting and prosecuting corporate crime.
